name: Snowball Effect - The journey of a Snowball
name_original: Snowball Effect - The journey of a Snowball
description:
Steer a snowball down a hill towards its destiny. Find your way around obstacles in this relaxing ball-rolling game.

This game will receive updates with additional levels and features. Suggest what you would like to see in the comments below!

I made the original game during Unreal Engine's Game Jam in December 2016. Download the original GameJam version here.

Music Credit: Chris Zabriskie - Cylinders
